title: AWESOME 3 BDRM/2 BATH IN BUSHWICK**GYM & SHARED BACKYARD* NO FEE
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Stunning 3 bed 2 full bath apt in Bushwick. There is a spacious living room with a skylight and a kitchen with a large kitchen island. Every room has windows and large closets!! Near many shops, groceries and everyday essentials. 

Features: 
-Gym
-Laundry 
-Virtual Doorman 
-Dishwasher
-Central Air 
-Backyard Access 
-Rooftop 

CALL/ TEXT TO VIEW 2064129852
